item.description:
Hello Hockey Fans,

For October's meetup we will heading out to see some College hockey action at Boston University. This year the terriers are hosting the University of New Brunswick on Sunday October 5 at 7 PM. If you are interested please RSVP for the event. Also, I am asking for payment up front for these tickets. There is a link at the bottom to paypal the money. If the link is not working you can paypal to ascholte@gmail.com

We'll be meeting beforehand at 6 PM at T's pub for dinner and/or drinks on the 5th.

Please let me know by September 30 if you are interesting in coming.

If you have any questions please let me know.

Thanks,

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: College Hockey - University of New Brunswick
